docs.text: Kevin's Documentation Template ¶ What is this? ¶ This is a template for building documentation from a GitHub repo using mkdocs and GitHub Actions and deploying to GitHub Pages. How to use this? ¶ Simply copy all files from this repo to the repo you are planning on using, change the variables in /mkdocs.yml and add your docs in /docs ! It's that easy!
docs.title: Kevin's Documentation Template

docs.text: This is a template for building documentation from a GitHub repo using mkdocs and GitHub Actions and deploying to GitHub Pages.
docs.title: What is this?

docs.text: Simply copy all files from this repo to the repo you are planning on using, change the variables in /mkdocs.yml and add your docs in /docs ! It's that easy!
docs.title: How to use this?

docs.text: Markdown Demo ¶ This page showcases some extras included in the template. For more info head to the mkDocs Material documentation . Abbreviations ¶ GNU /Unix Systems are the best. But do you know what GNU actually stands for? Admonitions ¶ Note By the way, I can be in a box. This is nice. Second important box I can even have a title... ...or no title at all! 1 2 <?php echo ( "But I have a code-block!" ); Tip I am shy. Success I am annoying, but you can close me!!!!!!!!!!!!! Question Why am I here? Warning Oh no, something is wrong, isn't it? Failure DEATH AND EXPLOSIONS EVERYWHERE! Danger It's very dangerous here! Bug And buggy. Example For example... Quote from the author I'm running out of ideas... Buttons ¶ Button Code and Keys ¶ 1 2 3 let test = true ; if ( test ) console . log ( "Test" ); Alt + F4 Tabs ¶ Tab 1 Hello! Tab 2 World! Table ¶ Food My Oppinion Cheesecake Yes! Pizza Yes!!! ...with Pineapple No :( Footnotes ¶ I am not 1 insane, I am very normal. 2 Checklists ¶ Write demo.md Be sane Get friends Get more self-esteem Not be insane Symbols ¶ ™ © ® ℅ ± → ← ↔ ≠ ¼, ⅕, ... 1 st , 2 nd , 3 rd , 4 th , ... "not" in this case may mean "definitely". ↩ "normal" is a lie. ↩
